replies.txt_content:
Details:         Entity Type: Arrow (net.minecraft.entity.projectile.EntityArrow)         Entity ID: 6755         Entity Name: arrow         Entity's Exact location: -93.35, 76.43, 353.58         Entity's Block location: World: (-94,76,353), Chunk: (at 2,4,1 in -6,22; contains blocks -96,0,352 to -81,255,367), Region: (-1,0; contains chunks -32,0 to -1,31, blocks -512,0,0 to -1,255,511)         Entity's Momentum: 1.59, -0.13, 0.24        实体: Arrow (net.minecraft.entity.projectile.EntityArrow)
        物品ID: 6755
        物品名字: arrow
错误类型：区块崩溃
解决方法：
打开world文件夹找到region 删除region文件夹里面的-1,0文件，重启服务器。
